posts.name: Artix Linux: Void Linux With the AUR?
posts.description: In this article, I discuss my experience with Artix versus my experience with Void, as well as some notable differences and similarities between the two.

posts.name: Making Pacman Easy
posts.description: In this post, I discuss quality-of-life (QOL) things related to pacman, like aliases and functions for certain things.

posts.name: Librewolf: The Best Browser?
posts.description: This post discusses Librewolf, a privacy-centric fork of Firefox.
